name: Frulam Mondath

action.name: Multiattack
text: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

action.name: Halberd
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary
• 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (2 slots): mass healing word, spirit guardians
